Module com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication
Package com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication.service

Class RootCommand

java.lang.Object
com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication.service.RootCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
RootCommandIfc
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleCommand, ClearCommand, CommentCommand, DrawToCommand, FillCommand, MoveToCommand, PenCommand, ReadFromFileCommand, RectangleCommand, ResetCommand, SaveToFileCommand, TriangleCommand
public class RootCommand extends Object implements RootCommandIfc
The FillCommand class represents validation of command and performing fill operation of pen based on defined instruction.
Since:
v1.0
